getAmountIn(uint256,uint256,uint256,uint.details: given an output amount of an asset and pair reserves, returns a required input amount of the other asset Formula: return = reserveIn * ( (reserveOut / (reserveOut - amountOut)) ^ (tokenWeightOut / tokenWeightIn) - 1) * (10000/ (10000 - swapFee)

params.tokenWeightIn: source reserve weight, represented in ppm (2-98)
params.tokenWeightOut: target reserve weight, represented in ppm (2-98)

getAmountOut(uint256,uint256,uint256,uin.details: given an input amount of an asset and pair reserves, returns the maximum output amount of the other asset, Formula: return = reserveOut * (1 - (reserveIn * 10000 / (reserveIn * 10000 + amountIn * (10000 - swapFee))) ^ (tokenWeightIn / tokenWeightOut))

params.tokenWeightIn: source reserve weight, represented in ppm (2-98)
params.tokenWeightOut: target reserve weight, represented in ppm (2-98)
